TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NAFilter extends Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.FilterBase
Public NotInheritable Class NAFilter Inherits FilterBase

Docs.summary: Removes missing values from vector type columns.
Docs.remarks: This transform removes the entire row if any of the input columns have a missing value in that row. This preprocessing is required for many ML algorithms that cannot work with missing values. Useful if any missing entry invalidates the entire row. If the is set to true, this transform would do the exact opposite, it will keep only the rows that have missing values.

Docs.param: Input . This is the output from previous transform or loader.
If true, keep only rows that contain NA values, and filter the rest.
Name of the columns. Only these columns will be used to filter rows having 'NA' values.
Docs.summary: Convenience constructor for public facing API.
